API.ADK

Class ReceiveBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • API.ADK.ReceiveBuffer

  • public class ReceiveBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Receive Message buffer. This buffer is filled inside the receive thread and taken by Driver.CANDevice.CANMessage.receiveMessage(API.ADK.MessageStructure) and Driver.CANDevice.CANMessage.receiveBufferStatus().
    Author:
    hroesdiyono

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private MessageStructure[] buffer
      The message buffer.
      private int bufferCount
      The current remaining message inside the buffer.
      private int bufferGet
      The current pointer for taken message.
      int bufferLength
      The length (number of line) is defined in the ConstantList.RECEIVE_BUFFER_LENGTH.
      private int bufferPut
      The current pointer for put message.
      (package private) java.util.concurrent.Semaphore bufferSemaphore
      Semaphore for writing and reading to the buffer and variables.
      ReturnCode receiveBufferStatus
      The status of the error buffer, ReturnCode.RECEIVE_BUFFER_NO_STATUS or ReturnCode.RECEIVE_BUFFER_OVERRUN.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReceiveBuffer()
      The default constructor of the ReceiveBuffer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReturnCode queueGet(MessageStructure receiveBuffer)
      Take a message from the receive buffer.
      ReturnCode queuePut(MessageStructure receiveBuffer)
      Put a message into the receive buffer.
      void resetBuffer()
      Reset the receive buffer and its status.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • queuePut

        public ReturnCode queuePut(MessageStructure receiveBuffer)
        Put a message into the receive buffer.
        Parameters:
        receiveBuffer - Input: The input message.
        Returns:
        ReturnCode.SUCCESS, ReturnCode.RECEIVE_BUFFER_FULL, ReturnCode.EXCEPTION_SEMAPHORE_ACQUIRE, or ReturnCode.EXCEPTION_SEMAPHORE_RELEASE.

      • queueGet

        public ReturnCode queueGet(MessageStructure receiveBuffer)
        Take a message from the receive buffer.
        Parameters:
        receiveBuffer - Output: The output message.
        Returns:
        ReturnCode.SUCCESS, ReturnCode.RECEIVE_BUFFER_EMPTY, ReturnCode.EXCEPTION_SEMAPHORE_ACQUIRE, or ReturnCode.EXCEPTION_SEMAPHORE_RELEASE.

      • resetBuffer

        public void resetBuffer()
        Reset the receive buffer and its status.
